programme.title: Paddington Station 24/7
programme.desc: The bank holiday works schedule is disrupted when reports come in of a trespasser on the relief lines outside London, forcing the cancellation of all trains leaving Paddington station. However, the total shutdown allows the engineers onto the track to renew large sections of the ageing rail infrastructure. Meanwhile, transport police hunt for a bike thief at Bristol's Temple Meads station

programme.title: OMG
programme.desc: Cases include Ryan, who has spent more than ¬£40,000 on his groomed appearance, though his risky tanning injections are damaging his relationship. Leza is obsessed with mirroring the girls she sees online, Brigid has surgically sculpted the perfect selfie body, while Jema is an old-school glamour girl who hates the new breed of Instagram models

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Dr Paul Binski chronicles the development of religious architecture during the 16th and 17th centuries. He contrasts the ornate splendour of the chapel at King's College, Cambridge, with the simplicity of post-Reformation churches

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice helps a chauffeur and his girlfriend spruce up their neglected seaside bungalow in Clacton-on-Sea, Essex, to make it more attractive to potential buyers, transforming the interior and landscaping the overgrown gardens. Presented by Alistair Appleton

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa's friend Suzy Sheep comes round to play, but George is not allowed to join in

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Sarah is convinced there is a polar bear in the area when she sees footprints in the snow

programme.title: The Tin Star (1957)
programme.desc: A world-weary bounty hunter, formerly a sheriff, arrives in a small town where a newly-appointed lawman is struggling to keep the peace. When he learns of the mercenary's past, the inexperienced lawman seeks his help in learning the tricks of the trade so he can bring an outlaw gang to justice. Anthony Mann's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Anthony Perkins, Lee Van Cleef, Betsy Palmer and Michel Ray

programme.title: Crack in the World (1965)
programme.desc: A dying scientist and his colleagues conduct experiments to harness the Earth's inner energy that seem set to end in disaster. Sci-fi thriller, with Dana Andrews, Janette Scott, Kieron Moore and Alexander Knox

programme.title: Last Train from Gun Hill (1959)
programme.desc: A marshal discovers the man responsible for raping and killing his wife is actually the son of an old friend, setting the scene for a showdown. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Anthony Quinn, Brian Hutton and Carolyn Jones

programme.title: Shenandoah (1965)
programme.desc: A Virginian farmer is left to raise seven children after his wife dies. He tries to keep his family out of the American Civil War, but when Union troops abduct his son, and his son-in-law enlists with the Confederates, he is unable to maintain his neutral stance and is dragged into the conflict. Western, starring James Stewart, Doug McClure, Rosemary Forsyth, Katharine Ross and Patrick Wayne

programme.title: Made in America (1993)
programme.desc: A black teenager who discovers she was conceived through artificial insemination asks her mother to track down the biological father. However, because of a mix-up in the sperm bank the donor is a brash second-hand car salesman - and white - with little inclination to take on the responsibilities of parenthood. Romantic comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Ted Danson, Nia Long and Will Smith

programme.title: Happy Death Day 2U (2019)
programme.desc: College student Tree Gelbman repeatedly lived through her own murder at the hands of a killer in a baby mask, until she learned how to outwit him and escape her fate. However, she is now stuck in another murderous time-loop, and has to face up to a fresh killer. Horror comedy sequel, starring Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard and Phi Vu

programme.title: Meet the Parents (2000)
programme.desc: A male nurse delays proposing to his girlfriend until he has won the approval of her strict father, a former CIA agent who does not suffer fools gladly, and vows to be on his best behaviour during a visit to her family home. However, his efforts to impress soon collapse into a catalogue of disasters. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner and Owen Wilson

programme.title: The Motorcycle Diaries (2004)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, chronicling the travels of a young Che Guevara. In 1952, the future revolutionary is a medical student who plans to serve his residency in a leper colony. Seeking a little excitement along the way, he and a friend decide to travel to the colony by motorbike, a journey that will take them across South America. However, both men are changed forever by the things they see along the way. Starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Rodrigo de la Serna, Mia Maestro and Gustavo Bueno. In Spanish, Quechua and Mapudungun

programme.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat (1957)
programme.desc: A lieutenant deserts after his commanding officer launches an unprovoked attack on a Comanche village during the Civil War. Realising that there are no soldiers in his home town to protect it from reprisals, he returns to train the local women to defend themselves. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Kathryn Grant, Hope Emerson and Jeff Donnell

programme.title: Man of the West (1958)
programme.desc: Reformed outlaw Link is left stranded in the wilderness with a saloon singer and a conman for company when the train they are travelling on is robbed. By chance they stumble upon Link's old gang holed up in a shack, but his former partners in crime threaten violence against them unless Link agrees to take part in a bank robbery. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Lee J Cobb, Julie London and Arthur O'Connell

programme.title: Appointment with Danger (1950)
programme.desc: A nun is targeted by two murderers when they realise she is the only witness to one of their killings, and it is up to postal inspector to protect her and bring the men to justice. Noir thriller, starring Phyllis Calvert, Alan Ladd and Paul Stewart

programme.title: Donovan's Reef (1963)
programme.desc: An American soldier settles down with a friend and a kindly doctor on a South Sea island to relax in the aftermath of the Second World War. The arrival of the medic's snobbish daughter throws their idyllic life into turmoil, leaving them struggling to make her father seem respectable. Comedy drama directed by John Ford, starring John Wayne, Lee Marvin, Jack Warden, Elizabeth Allen and Cesar Romero

programme.title: The Iron Lady (2011)
programme.desc: The elderly Margaret Thatcher, now living in seclusion, tries to come to terms with the death of her husband Denis, bringing back memories of her controversial political career. She reflects on her rise to power in the male-dominated Conservative Party and the tumultuous events during her time in office. Biopic, starring an Oscar-winning Meryl Streep. With Jim Broadbent and Olivia Colman

programme.title: The Godfather (1972)
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: Topsy-Turvy (1999)
programme.desc: Mike Leigh's Oscar-winning drama exploring the sometimes strained relationship between 19th-century musical duo Gilbert and Sullivan. After a series of enthusiastically reviewed shows, the duo are horrified by the critical mauling their latest offering receives, and look set to leave the business. Jim Broadbent, Allan Corduner, Sukie Smith, Dexter Fletcher, Timothy Spall, Roger Heathcott, Geoffrey Hutchings and Wendy Nottingham star

programme.title: Yangtse Incident (1957)
programme.desc: A British frigate is heavily shelled and captured by Chinese communists on the Yangtse River in 1949. After a failed rescue mission by a sister ship, the remaining crew members put into action a daring escape plan that involves disguising the vessel and slipping her moorings under the cover of darkness. Fact-based action adventure, starring Richard Todd, William Hartnell and Akim Tamiroff

programme.title: A Town Like Alice (1956)
programme.desc: Second World War PoW Jean Paget is sent on a gruelling forced march between Japanese labour camps, but finds comfort in her friendship with Australian captive Joe Harman. During the journey Joe is caught stealing, tied to a cross and left to die. After the conflict is over, Jean is startled to receive a letter postmarked in Joe's home town of Alice Springs. Jack Lee's drama, based on the novel by Nevil Shute, starring Virginia McKenna, Peter Finch, Takagi and Jean Anderson

programme.title: Howards End (1992)
programme.desc: A chance encounter during a cruise throws the romantic Schlegel sisters into the paths of the Wilcoxes, an industrious family headed by the well-meaning but strait-laced Henry. When aristocratic matriarch Ruth Wilcox bequeaths her family home to Margaret Schlegel, her children are outraged and dispose of the will, setting the stage for a conflict with tragic consequences. Merchant Ivory period drama, based on EM Forster's novel, starring Emma Thompson, Anthony Hopkins and Helena Bonham Carter

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II (1988)
programme.desc: The rugged Australian adventurer sets out to save his reporter girlfriend from New York drug dealers. Having rescued her from their clutches, he realises they will soon be coming after him - so he decides to even the odds by luring them to the Outback for a final showdown. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon and Charles S Dutton

programme.title: The Godfather Part II (1974)
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: Her Smell (2018)
programme.desc: A self-destructive punk rocker struggles with sobriety while trying to recapture the creative inspiration that led her band to success. Writer/director Alex Ross Perry's drama, starring Elisabeth Moss, Cara Delevingne and Dan Stevens

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The Osborne family head to The Dog for dinner after Nancy's big presentation. An offer from Tony might mean that Felix has the right venue for his youth club

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tension is running high in Hollyoaks village as a teenager is caught red-handed. Later, Donna-Marie lets loose at singles' night

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Denver, Colorado, where he meets the stubborn owner of Italian restaurant Pantaleone's, who appears to be firmly stuck in the past. Pete maintains he makes the best pizza in town - based on a review from the 1980s - but the fiery chef's own taste test proves the opposite. With Pete's wife Paulette and son Josh threatening to leave, can Gordon get through to him and save the business?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Arvada, Colorado, where a husband and wife have allowed their restaurant to fall into disrepair. Randy's hoarding is out of control, while Alexa, who runs the kitchen, has a lot to learn. To make matters worse, the Old Neighborhood is one of the filthiest eateries the fiery chef has ever seen, and only one of the biggest transformations of the series can save the business

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly takes up dancing with her friends but is dejected when her family is unimpressed by her intention to perform a dance routine in a recital. Adam worries about losing his friendship with Emmy when she starts dating a handsome older classmate, but his attempts to be cooler than the newcomer backfire

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry gets the chance to throw the first pitch at a Phillies baseball game and believes this represents his opportunity to play professionally, but he couldn't be more wrong. Meanwhile, Erica makes an important decision about her future in college

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon are forced to defend themselves against criticism from an online bully after publishing a physics paper. Meanwhile, the girls confront embarrassing moments from their pasts during a night in. Comedy, guest starring Stephen Hawking, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Penny tries to teach Sheldon how to 'let it go', but she is unable to follow her own advice when she learns something infuriating about Amy. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Fillion, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

American comedy, starring Eric Stonestreet, Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct by two physicists from Chicago - until the experts try to exclude Amy from their Nobel Prize nomination. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

The 100th episode of the family sitcom, starring Eric Stonetreet, Ty Burrell, Julie Bowen and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

Nathan Lane guest stars

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Catching up with two sets of house-hunters at different stages of life. In 2019, Alistair and Candice were searching in Swindon's pricey old town. Going against the norm of designing a serious and practical home, the couple's property features a revolving bookcase door, secret dens, hiding places and a fireman's pole. Matt uses a steel frame system to allow them to change the layout of the property, and other changes include amending the window shapes and sizes, and adding a half floor to create a James Bond room

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Tree surgeon David, 27, is airlifted to St George's after falling 40ft to the ground, hitting several branches on his way down and landing head-first onto concrete. Anne, 74, arrives with a sharp pain in her chest, 51-year-old taxi driver Mark receives treatment for a cut on his finger caused by broken glass, and 92-year-old Betty is brought in by ambulance after her carers found her with slurred speech and a shaking hand

Jeremy Clarkson and James May join forces to create a public information film to promote safer cycling, with their efforts presented to a panel of experts including members of Westminster Council and Olympic gold medal-winning rider Chris Boardman. Meanwhile, Jeremy - who has promised to change his name to Jennifer if the Porsche is faster around the test track than the McLaren P1 driven earlier in the series - compares the seventh-generation Volkswagen Golf GTI to BMW's critically acclaimed M135i. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Russia as the motoring magazine returns, taking part in a race across the urban landscape of St Petersburg. James defends the honour of the car in a very small Renault, Richard tries to prove that pedalling is faster by riding a bicycle, while Jeremy attempts to demonstrate that water is the quickest way across town by piloting a hovercraft. To make matters more complicated, all three presenters are racing not only one another but also the Stig, who is making his way toward the finish line by public transport. Plus, the new Lamborghini Huracan is put through its paces and singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran takes to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits the Worcestershire village of Hartlebury, which was once home to a bishop who captured Queen Victoria's attention, on the second leg of his journey from Oxford to the south Wales coast. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the next leg of his journey, Michael Portillo heads along the Essex bank of the Thames before crossing the river into Kent. He begins in Barkingside, where Victorian philanthropist Thomas Barnardo made it his mission to transform the lives of destitute children. The former politician then tries his hand at loading a container onto a pocket wagon at Tilbury docks, and ends his trip in Rochester, where he encounters a host of familiar characters and explores a town that was an inspiration for many of Charles Dickens' works

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on another journey around the nation with a copy of George Bradshaw's Victorian Railway Guidebook to discover how the railways have affected people and what remains of Bradshaw's Britain. He begins by travelling from High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, to Stratford-upon-Avon in Warwickshire, finding out about the remarkable craftsmen behind the Victorian furniture trade, discovering how George Bradshaw helped save Britain's canal heritage and seeing Shakespeare through the eyes of a 19th-century rail tourist

Drama, starring David McCallum, Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Lauren Holly

Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly star

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

However, an eyewitness later comes forward and implicates Tony. Starring Lauren Holly and Mark Harmon

programme.desc: A serial rapist represents himself in court and is released on bail, despite his first victim picking him out during an identity parade. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: The Blacklist

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Nothing to Declare

programme.title: Nothing to Declare

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Geordi alerts Captain Picard to a member of the engineering team who is failing to come up to scratch and placing the crew in jeopardy because of his obsession with a fantasy world. Sci-fi drama, starring Patrick Stewart and LeVar Burton

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: Part two of two. Captain Archer comes face to face with Sarin, who reveals Klaang was delivering proof of a Suliban conspiracy to the high court when he was shot down. Sci-fi drama, starring Scott Bakula and Jolene Blalock

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Captain Janeway is haunted by a succession of recurring images from an unpleasant experience on the holodeck. Starring Kate Mulgrew and Robert Picardo

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A petty officer arriving at airport security dies during a random search. Conducting an autopsy on the body, Dr Wade suspects that he died from natural causes. However, just as she is concluding her examination, a man enters the morgue, demanding to take the deceased back to his family. After Wade refuses, he pulls a gun and holds her, Sebastian Lund and Danny Malloy hostage. Drama, starring CCH Pounder, Scott Bakula and Lucas Black

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Deacon's family gets caught in the crosshairs of a drug cartel when he and the team aim to bring down its leader, who is running narcotics in plain sight via a flower market. Hondo receives troubling news regarding his father, and Tan is forced to go before an internal review board due to his girlfriend's indiscretion

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: A woman is struck by a car while suffering terrifying hallucinations. Though seriously injured she survives the accident, but during the commotion an unidentified man arrives on the scene and strangles her. Nick and Hank investigate, and discover a goat-like creature that could be behind a series of recent disappearances

programme.title: Snapped
programme.desc: A grieving family is hit with another devastating loss when a man finds his sister stabbed to death in her living room

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: Detectives look back on the case of Elijah Butler, murdered four days after he married his wife - by her long-term stalker

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Pocket Dragon Adventures
programme.desc: A group of very small dragons live with a kindly old wizard, they're not big enough to fly but that doesn't stop them having many adventures

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: The guardian of the temple has passed on and a new Golden Dragon must be Chosen from a brother and sister - Twins born in the Year of the Dragon. Only one will be chosen. Their sibling bond tested

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: Moonbase Alpha receives a distress call from the survivors of a dying planet, and discover a world where half the inhabitants have reverted to barbarism in an effort to stay alive. Guest starring Joan Collins, with Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: Castle Builders
programme.desc: Examining the blood, sweat and vision behind Europe's castles, from the nobles' plans to the craftsmen's practical know-how

programme.title: Terry and Mason's Great Food Trip
programme.desc: Terry Wogan and Mason McQueen continue their culinary journey around the nation, abandoning the cab for a punt along the River Cherwell in Oxford. Terry visits the city's old jail and they investigate the origins of the Oxford sausage and the famous old Oxford marmalade factory, before meeting students at the university who have formed a society to assess the scientific benefits of pizza

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Monroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: World Natural Heritage: Costa Rica
programme.desc: From the pacific coast up to the tropical rainforests of Costa Rica. Experience an untouched, pure jungle, home to iguanas, venomous snakes, capuchin monkeys

programme.title: Never Let Go (1960)
programme.desc: A salesman is forced to desperate measures when his car is stolen, putting his career and marriage on the line. Crime drama, starring Richard Todd and Peter Sellers

programme.title: Up in the World (1956)
programme.desc: A bumbling window cleaner is elated to land a job at an aristocrat's country house. However, the spoilt young heir to the estate likes to play pranks on him - and lands the hapless servant in very hot water after the pair make a trip to a nightclub together and walk straight into a kidnap plot. Comedy, starring Norman Wisdom, Michael Caridia, Maureen Swanson and Jerry Desmonde

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Monroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mannering is about to give a valuation for a client when the man dies. This leads the Baron and Cordelia to an old dark house in the country where mysterious goings on have been reported

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Revolution in Colour
programme.desc: Part two of two. Professor Eunan O'Halpin investigates the struggle for Irish independence in the years after the end of the First World War, and the outbreak of civil war in 1922

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Six becomes a pawn in a human game of chess while trying to recruit an army of like-minded souls - and learns to judge the Villagers' allegiances by their moves. Cult drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: The police wake to the news of a robbery, but the full extent of the crime and its haul - ¬£2.6million - only becomes evident over the following days. It's clear the local CID is ill-equipped to solve a case of such magnitude, so Scotland Yard is called in, with a six-strong team of detectives headed by the Flying Squad's enigmatic chief Tommy Butler. In a race against time, they set out to identify every criminal involved and bring them to justice before they flee the country - but even if they can, will they find the money? Jim Broadbent stars in the concluding part of the drama about the most infamous heist in British history, with George Costigan, Robert Glenister, Tim Pigott-Smith, Nick Moran and John Salthouse. Written by Broadchurch creator Chris Chibnall

programme.title: Brighton (2019)
programme.desc: With Larry Lamb. Two working class couples go on a day trip to Brighton which ends in disaster

programme.title: Haraam (2018)
programme.desc: A man tries to pluck up the courage to profess his love to a departing co-worker of a very different cultural, ethnic and religious background before she leaves on her last day of work. Drama, starring Ainy Jaffri and Cherno Jagne

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Rudyard Kipling: A Secret Life
programme.desc: A profile of the author, which looks at how the writer's childhood and the loss of two of his three children influenced his work

programme.title: Lionheart (1968)
programme.desc: A lion escapes from a circus but is rescued and protected by a young boy. Children's drama, starring James Forlong and Louise Rush

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing Crystal Palace and Shoreditch. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Black Hairapy
programme.desc: Short documentary exploring the relationship between Afro hair and identity within the UK Afro-Caribbean community

programme.title: Terry and Mason's Great Food Trip
programme.desc: Terry Wogan and Mason McQueen continue their culinary journey around the nation, abandoning the cab for a punt along the River Cherwell in Oxford. Terry visits the city's old jail and they investigate the origins of the Oxford sausage and the famous old Oxford marmalade factory, before meeting students at the university who have formed a society to assess the scientific benefits of pizza

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Pocket Dragon Adventures
programme.desc: A group of very small dragons live with a kindly old wizard, they're not big enough to fly but that doesn't stop them having many adventures

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: The guardian of the temple has passed on and a new Golden Dragon must be Chosen from a brother and sister - Twins born in the Year of the Dragon. Only one will be chosen. Their sibling bond tested

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Alphans find themselves drawn inexorably toward a deadly black sun, prompting Koenig to launch a desperate escape bid. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mannering is about to give a valuation for a client when the man dies. This leads the Baron and Cordelia to an old dark house in the country where mysterious goings on have been reported

programme.title: Revolution in Colour
programme.desc: Part two of two. Professor Eunan O'Halpin investigates the struggle for Irish independence in the years after the end of the First World War, and the outbreak of civil war in 1922

programme.title: Coastal Railways with Julie Walters
programme.desc: The actress travels on the famous Great Western Railway to Cornwall. She recalls childhood holidays when she stops at Torquay before heading to a supposedly haunted castle at Kingswear. She also uncovers tales of smuggling and joins members of the RNLI on a practice run before visiting an unusual cake shop in Penzance

programme.title: Tales of Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: The Royal Ballet performs Frederick Ashton's family ballet, bringing to life Beatrix Potter's famous images and children's stories. Created for a film in 1971 featuring music arranged by John Lanchbery from popular Victorian and Edwardian melodies, the production brings to the Covent Garden stage such colourful figures as Jemima Puddleduck, Jeremy Fisher, Mrs Tiggywinkle, Mr Fox and the irrepressible Peter Rabbit

programme.title: The Big Knife (1955)
programme.desc: An unscrupulous studio executive will go to any lengths to keep a movie star on contract, even threatening to expose his part in a hit and run incident. The actor relents and a cover-up is prepared, but to keep the secret buried, criminal actions are required. Drama, starring Jack Palance, Rod Steiger and Ida Lupino

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Fern, a beautiful blue Burmese and one of the Cat Hospital's oldest patients takes a turn for the worse. Franklin, a prize-winning Maine coon, a novice when it comes to females meets Ruby - but will romance ensue? Veterinary specialist Clare Meade meets a visiting cat called Honey

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.desc: Harvey's plans are scuppered, and Monty stashes his black-market goods in Rita's prefab

programme.title: A Patch of Fog (2015)
programme.desc: A famous writer and academic living off the reputation of his single novel resorts to shoplifting to introduce some excitement to his stable life. He is caught in the act by a lonely, unbalanced security guard, who has an unusual price for his silence - he wants them to be friends, and goes to disturbing lengths to force himself into the author's life. Thriller, starring Stephen Graham, Conleth Hill and Lara Pulver

programme.desc: An ex-convict must stay out of trouble for one more day to secure his freedom - but must choose between his principles and his future when he comes to the aid of a prostitute under threat from a gang. Action thriller, starring Steven Murphy and Tiffany-Ellen Robinson

When she learns her husband's plans for his son, she reveals the truth, setting in motion a tragic confrontation. Drama, starring Melina Mercouri and Anthony Perkins

programme.desc: Documentary series investigating how the Nazi leader managed to escape assassination more than 40 times, thanks mainly to his personal protection squad, which grew from a few fiercely loyal, hand-picked ruffians into an army with a complicated structure and intense internal competition

programme.title: We Are the Lambeth Boys

programme.title: Buster (1988)
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about the life of Buster Edwards, a member of the gang responsible for the Great Train Robbery. Going on the run after the notorious heist, he flees to Mexico with his family. However, his homesick wife struggles to adapt to her new life, leaving the outlaw with a difficult choice. Starring Phil Collins, Julie Walters, Sheila Hancock, Larry Lamb and Ralph Brown

programme.title: Wilt (1989)
programme.desc: An unlucky lecturer with idle fantasies of killing his wife finds himself in a compromising position with an inflatable sex doll. His efforts to dispose of it land him in trouble when his wife subsequently disappears, and an obsessive detective becomes convinced he has murdered her and been seen disposing of the body. Comedy based on Tom Sharpe's novel, starring Griff Rhys Jones, Mel Smith and Alison Steadman
